content: this **beginner** ear warmer is the perfect thing for all your fall and winter craft fairs or for holiday gifting it uses only basic stitches to make this fun textured fabric that works up super quickly if you can crochet a half_double_crochet rectangle you can make this ear warmer this pdf has everything you might need to make this pattern including clear written instructions supplemental photos a stitch chart and video to show you how to make this pattern from start to finish not a beginner the pdf also has a consolidated version of the pattern for you more experienced crocheters **included in the pdf us terms english only ** * cover page with a large full-color photo of the finished item * required materials pattern notes etc page * detailed pattern with supplemental instructional photos notes and tips and tricks * link to a full video pattern for this pattern * consolidated pattern for more experienced crocheters * completion page with another large full-color photo of the finished item * stitch chart - not available in the free online version **other details ** finished size available in 6 sizes 1-3 yrs 3-5 yrs 6-10 yrs teen/adult small adult medium adult large **let s keep in touch ** want to be the first to know when a new pattern drops join my email list get details and sign up here 1 want to hang out me too find me on instagram 2 facebook 3 + youtube 4 thanks for supporting my business i hope you enjoy the pattern and feel free to message me if you have any questions 1 https //www hooksbookswanderlust com/free-printable/ 2 https //www instagram com/hooksbookswanderlust/ 3 https //www facebook com/hooksbookswanderlust 4 https //www youtube com/hooksbookswanderlust
